concept.title: Data
concept.shortdesc: The data element embedds data, usually used to interact with the Ethereum blockchain

conbody.p: The data element is like a carrier: It contains different elements of data. Usually it is used inside an ethereum element to declare the data used for smart contract calls or transaction creation.

section.title: Code Examples
section.p: Define the needed data for an Ethereum call to fill an attribute
Define amount used in an Ethereum transaction

Define amount and receiver for a transactions<ts:transaction> <ethereum:transaction function="transfer" contract="DAI"> <ts:data> <ts:address> 0x4aa42145Aa6Ebf72e164C9bBC74fbD3788045016 </ts:address> <ts:uint256 ref="amount"/> </ts:data> </ethereum:transaction> </ts:transaction>
